contentrichtext.text: '''Robert Rogers''' may refer to: *[[Robert Rogers (soldier)|Robert Rogers]] (1731–1795), American colonial officer, explorer and playwright *[[Robert Rogers (Manitoba politician)|Robert Rogers]] (1864–1936), Canadian politician *[[Robert Rogers (parliamentary official)|Robert Rogers]], Chief Executive and Clerk of the House of Commons of the United Kingdom *[[Robert Rogers (novelist)|Robert Rogers]], American writer under the pennames of Lee Rogers, Jean Barrett, and Jean Thomas *[[Robert Empie Rogers]] (1813–1884), United States chemist *[[Robert Gordon Rogers]] (1919–2010), Canadian Lieutenant Governor of British Columbia *[[Robert Louis Rogers]], former [[List of Canadian ambassadors to Israel|Canadian ambassador to Israel]] *[[Robert Montresor Rogers]] (1834–1895), Irish recipient of the Victoria Cross *[[Bobby Rogers]] (born 1940), American Motown singer/songwriter, member of The Miracles ==Fiction== *[[Just Imagine...#Shazam|Robert Rogers]], a mild mannered Interpol agent, the Stan Lee incarnation of DC Comics Captain Marvel == See also == *[[Robert L. Rodgers]] (1875–1960), U.S. Representative from Pennsylvania *[[Bob Rogers (disambiguation)]] {{hndis|Rogers, Robert}}
